#summary Old-style CvStereoBMState

= Reference =

Structure CvStereoBMState is replaced by the more robust and more efficient StereoBM class. 

|| *OpenCV* || *PyOpenCV* ||
|| CvStereoBMState || StereoBM ||
|| cvCreateStereoBMState || StereoBM's constructor ||
|| cvReleaseStereoBMState(z) || no need to invoke but if you insist: del z ||
|| cvFindStereoCorrespondenceBM || StereoBM.operator() ||
